name: Country Cooking in Village
description:
The career of famous village cooking chef is waiting for you – just try, you won’t be disappointed! All this city food and fast-food is so unhealthy and boring… Go to the countryside and open your own tavern filled with amazingly delicious dishes and medieval atmosphere made special for the tourists! Play Country Cooking in Village and just enjoy your new job!

Eco-tourism is really popular now, so you can become a part of this trend – just create your own inn! People are happy to eat some potatoes with meat, fish or veggies washing it down with a good mug of ginger ale or just squeezed juice! Become an exquisite cooking chef – although the village food can’t seem to be difficult, in fact, it is!

Cook every order in time if you want to watch your tavern rating rising! Start with the easiest recipes ever – just juice, ale and fresh vegetable salad - and then you’ll be able to cook something really authentic and special! Fragrant apple pies, fresh potatoes with carrot, beef, and sauces… So yummy! Nobody can remain indifferent – we are sure! Check this Country Cooking in Village game and have much fun!

Power your cooking skills up in these unbelievable conditions! Watch colorful pixel graphics around you, smell fantastic scents even without leaving your room and become the real cooking master! Learn more interesting recipes and just enjoy!

Country Cooking in Village features:
• Trendy type of eco-village cooking
• Tastiest recipes ever
• Fascinating cooking steps
• Large beautiful kitchen to work at
• Wonderful pixel graphics

Check your amazing cooking skills in these outstanding conditions of Country Cooking in Village – you won’t be disappointed!
